item.name: RabbitMQ check
item.description: Single item to trigger all checks. Get this item will launch python script on RabbitMQ server. The script will use RabbitMQ HTTP API to gather all metrics we need and send them as Zabbic Trappers

item.name: RabbitMQ discovery
item.description: Single item to trigger discovery. Get this item will launch python script on RabbitMQ server. The script will use RabbitMQ HTTP API to discover all relevant metrics and send them as Low Level Discovery

item.name: RabbitMQ global stats messages in $1 status
RabbitMQ global stats messages in $1 status
RabbitMQ global stats messages in $1 status
RabbitMQ global stats messages in $1 status
RabbitMQ global stats messages in $1 status
RabbitMQ global stats messages in $1 status
RabbitMQ global stats messages in $1 status
RabbitMQ global stats messages in $1 status
RabbitMQ queues stats current messages count
RabbitMQ queues stats current ready messages count
RabbitMQ queues stats current unacknowledged messages count
Zabbix script version
item.description: Provides version number of script running on host to monitor RabbitMQ. Should be same number as template user macro {$ZBX_TPL_VERSION}

item_prototype.name: ACK message rate for {#RMQQUEUENAME} in RabbitMQ vhost {#RMQVHOSTNAME}
DELIVER_GET message rate for {#RMQQUEUENAME} in RabbitMQ vhost {#RMQVHOSTNAME}
DL Message count for {#RMQQUEUENAME} in RabbitMQ vhost {#RMQVHOSTNAME}
GET message rate for {#RMQQUEUENAME} in RabbitMQ vhost {#RMQVHOSTNAME}
Master node for {#RMQQUEUENAME} in RabbitMQ vhost {#RMQVHOSTNAME}
Message count for {#RMQQUEUENAME} in RabbitMQ vhost {#RMQVHOSTNAME}
PUBLISH message rate for {#RMQQUEUENAME} in RabbitMQ vhost {#RMQVHOSTNAME}
REDELIVER message rate for {#RMQQUEUENAME} in RabbitMQ vhost {#RMQVHOSTNAME}

trigger_prototype.name: We are getting late in {#RMQVHOSTNAME}:{#RMQQUEUENAME}
trigger_prototype.description: RabbitMQ queue {#RMQQUEUENAME} in vhost {#RMQVHOSTNAME} PUBLISH rate is more than {#RMQRATIOTHRES} times greater than GET rate. You should consider adding more workers

trigger_prototype.name: We have Dead-letter messages in {#RMQVHOSTNAME}:{#RMQQUEUENAME}
trigger_prototype.description:
DL queue for {#RMQVHOSTNAME} in RabbitMQ vhost {#RMQVHOSTNAME} contains messages.
Please investigate via RabbitMQ Web interface

trigger_prototype.name: We have too many messages in {#RMQVHOSTNAME}:{#RMQQUEUENAME}
trigger_prototype.description: RabbitMQ queue {#RMQQUEUENAME} in vhost {#RMQVHOSTNAME} contains more than {#RMQMSGTHRESH} for 5 minutes. You should consider adding more workers

trigger_prototype.expression: ({TRIGGER.VALUE}=0 and ({BBC_TPL_RABBITMQ:rabbitmq.queue[{#RMQVHOSTNAME},{#RMQQUEUENAME},master].last()}=1 and ({BBC_TPL_RABBITMQ:rabbitmq.queue[{#RMQVHOSTNAME},{#RMQQUEUENAME},count,message].min(5m)}>{#RMQMSGTHRESH}))) or ({TRIGGER.VALUE}=1 and ({BBC_TPL_RABBITMQ:rabbitmq.queue[{#RMQVHOSTNAME},{#RMQQUEUENAME},master].last()}=1 and ({BBC_TPL_RABBITMQ:rabbitmq.queue[{#RMQVHOSTNAME},{#RMQQUEUENAME},count,message].max(10m)}>({#RMQMSGTHRESH}*0.75) or {BBC_TPL_RABBITMQ:rabbitmq.queue[{#RMQVHOSTNAME},{#RMQQUEUENAME},count,message].min(5m)}>({#RMQMSGTHRESH}*10))))
trigger_prototype.name: We have too many messages in {#RMQVHOSTNAME}:{#RMQQUEUENAME}
trigger_prototype.description: RabbitMQ queue {#RMQQUEUENAME} in vhost {#RMQVHOSTNAME} contains more than {#RMQMSGTHRESH} for 5 minutes. You should consider adding more workers

trigger.name: RabbitMQ AMQP TCP port is not opened
RabbitMQ check failed
trigger.description: RabbitMQ Checks failed during last 3 attemps. You should connect to RabbitMQ Web Interface & investigate.

trigger.name: RabbitMQ discovery failed
trigger.description: RabbitMQ Discovery failed at least 1 time during last 5 attemps. You should connect to RabbitMQ Web Interface & investigate.

trigger.name: RabbitMQ Management TCP port is not opened
RabbitMQ Template and Script version mismatched
